Docs.summary: This namespace contains classes for performing queries on stores.

remarks.para: Two implementations of the abstract class are provided in this namespace. A Query class implements an algorithm to return all of the ways a set of variables may bind to resources in a , subject to different types of constraints.

The class implements a basic graph-matching algorithm. This algorithm takes two graphs and matches the variables in the query graph to resources in the target graph. Each of the ways a variable can bind to a resource is returned as a instance.
The class implements the SPARQL query specification. This class wraps the SPARQL Engine for Sesame found at http://sparql.sf.net (via IKVM).
